title.rendered: “Digiperform is the most trusted brand in digital education for relevant learning.” – Hiteshi Malhotra

content.rendered:
Hi Readers! Meet Digiperformer Hiteshi Malhotra, presently handling the Marketing & Communication Department of a German MNC “Giesecke & Devrient”. In a chit-chat session, she shared how Digiperform’s advanced digital marketing training program helped her to upgrade her existing marketing skills to grab bigger opportunities. Have a look!

Digiperform- It’s a pleasure to connect with you! Before heading further, we would like to know a bit about you.

Hiteshi- Currently, I am handling the Marketing & Communication department of a German MNC. I have been working here since last two and a half years almost. I got bored with the monotonous and older marketing tactics that I used to implement to achieve the goals. And I actually wanted to update my skill sets with the latest digital marketing techniques.

Digiperform- What originally attracted you to choose digital marketing as your career?

Hiteshi- My company was switching from traditional to digital marketing. Consequently, it was required to know the details of the same. Moreover, Digital Marketing has loads of opportunity for techies, creative folks, and professionals. And as the industry develops and changes, there’s constantly something new and interesting to learn & explore.

Digiperform- What exactly that makes us stand out from the competition & urge you to choose us over others?

Hiteshi- Since I am a working professional, I was looking for the weekend classes with suitable timing. And my search for finding suitable & high-quality institute ended at Digiperform. Also, knowledgeable trainers and elegant modules helped me a lot to gain the required skills.

Digiperform- Tell us about your favorite experience you had with us, whether as a learner or as a customer?

Hiteshi- Advanced in-class learning experience with practical implementations is one of my favorite experiences at Digiperform.

Digiperform- Would you consider Digiperform as a trusted & reliable resource for Digital marketing training? Why?

Hiteshi- Undeniably, Digiperform is the most trusted brand in digital education for relevant learning.

Digiperform-  If you were to review our training program, what score would you give it out of 10?

Hiteshi- I’ll rate Digiperform 9 out of 10.

Digiperform- Where do you see yourself in the next 5 years?

Hiteshi- Maybe doing my own business – dealing with brands for their digital marketing needs

Digiperform- If you had a piece of advice to someone just starting out, what would it be?

Hiteshi- If you want to enter the marketing or communication field, it would be advisable to have a good learning of the digital space since it’s the “in” thing and has a long way to go.

Digiperform- Finally, Describe Digiperform in one line.

Hiteshi- Good learning space with knowledgeable trainers. Thanks, Hiteshi for being the part of Digiperform family.
